overview: This second collection of short films spans several decades in an attempt to bring some of the best avant-garde horror efforts to the screen: "The Mesmerist," "The Early 70s Horro Trailer," "Psych-Burn," "Between 2 Deaths," "Amor Peligrosa," "Hold My Scissors," "Opus 5," "The Fear," and "She Sank on Shallow Bank."
title: Experiments in Terror 2
